tidbits.title: Historical Richness
tidbits.description: Zimbabwe has a rich historical heritage, including the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Great Zimbabwe, an ancient city known for its impressive stone ruins.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: The country boasts diverse landscapes, from the iconic Victoria Falls to national parks like Hwange and Mana Pools, offering abundant wildlife and stunning scenery.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Zimbabwe has a diverse cultural landscape, with various ethnic groups contributing to its vibrant music, dance, art, and traditional ceremonies.
